## QueryApi.rows() method

Creates a cold observable of the rows returned by the given query.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rows(query: string | ParameterizedQuery): Observable<Row>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  query | string \| ParameterizedQuery | query |

<b>Returns:</b>
